name: Demagnetized
description: In this 3D action-shooter, play as a lone magnetic robot whose friends have all gone berserk! Help it find and incapacitate them so they can be cured. Shoot robots to demagnetize them, then knock them apart- but don't let them do the same to you! Balance attack and defense with this unique risk and reward health system. Find and defeat all the bots in each of the 5 levels to save the day.
